title: Sampler, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: double running, cross and surface buttonhole stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 65 x 16 cm (25 9/16 x 6 5/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Eleven cross borders of floral and geometric ornament; alphabet and "I. H."
